entry.title: WIND WARNING , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 3:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: W 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
